lines.text: You should watch Erika, Waldemar. Her spirit is false. She's totally evil.
I know she's perverse...but she has such beauty!
Waldemar, why don't we go for them in the monastery and try to destroy them?
Only during the night of the Holy Moon will I have sufficient power to destroy her.
From now on, you will be my faithful servant, and soon your master will be my slave.
